== Process ==
* creating rules for prefix usages, e.g. adding prefix [FEAT] to the LP bug title to denote new features or feature requests, adding prefix [FWTS-Live] for fwts-live related bugs etc.
* revise <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/FirmwareTestSuite/FirmwareTestSuiteReportBug | bug reporting guideline]]</nowiki> to formally allow people file bugs against the FWTS project in LP directly
* collect opinions about the release process from each release manager
